name: ProtoPANIC
description:
Massive WIP notice

"Right" or "Left" click on your Power Points (light blue capsules) to spawn units.

[1] Units will be controlled with right clicking and dragging (red circle)

[2] Units will be controlled with left clicking and dragging (green circle)

Future Objectives: Take over the space station while capturing more power points and feeding on the humans that try defend it against you.
